name: DOCS_RCVD_AUDIT
description: Care Everywhere Received Documents Audit contains a list of documents of a particular type received for a patient including the doc, request and message ids, instants, users, status, and contexts.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: DOC_ID_AUDIT
columns.description: Document id received from the remote organization

columns.name: REQ_DOC_ID_AUDIT
columns.description: Document ID that was requested from the remote organization

columns.name: REQ_USER_AUDIT_ID
columns.description: User ID of the person requesting the document

columns.name: REQ_USER_AUDIT_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: REQ_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status for this audit line of the request

columns.name: REQ_CONTEXT_C_NAME
columns.description: Context in which the request was placed
entries: Automatic Update on Chart Access - Have Future Appointment
Automatic Update on Chart Access - Received Request
Automatic Update on Chart Access - Received Event Notification
Automatic Update on Chart Access - Received PnR Message
Automatic Update on Chart Access - Outdated Data
Automatic Update on Chart Access - Outdated Preadmission Data
Automatic Update on EpicCare Link Chart Access
Automatic Payer Update on Prior Auth
Automatic Update on Received O&RA Result
Automatic Update to Resolve Chart Sync Conflict
Life Sciences Exchange Study Enrollment Deleted
Life Sciences Exchange Study Enrollment Undeleted

columns.name: REQ_STA_RSN_CODE_C_NAME
entries: Patient is not participating in Care Everywhere at this organization.

Document is too large to be sent.
